TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MembershipProviderCollection extends System.Configuration.Provider.ProviderCollection
Public NotInheritable Class MembershipProviderCollection Inherits ProviderCollection

summary.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

span.span: A collection of objects that inherit the abstract class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的成员资格提供程序公开为只读副本由属性的类。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 可以按名称访问集合中的特定成员资格提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理成员身份信息，以及访问的成员资格提供程序的自定义成员不属于抽象类。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[成员资格简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了为应用程序和其各自的类型启用的提供程序。The following code example lists the providers enabled for an application and their respective types. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/CS/Providerscs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.Membership#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.Membership/VB/Providersvb.aspx#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序的成员资格提供程序公开为只读副本由属性的类。The membership providers for an application are exposed as a read-only by the property of the class. 可以按名称访问集合中的特定成员资格提供程序并将其强制转换为特定的提供程序类型，如。You can access a specific membership provider in the collection by name and cast it as the specific provider type, such as . 这使您可以从多个数据存储在单个应用程序中管理成员身份信息，以及访问的成员资格提供程序的自定义成员不属于抽象类。This enables you to manage membership information from multiple data stores in a single application as well as access custom members of a membership provider that are not part of the abstract class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例访问配置中的应用程序属性的类的名称。The following code example accesses a configured for an application from the property of the class by name.
